column1: #Text=Bolin says : " Mister President , get back , I 'm here to help . "
#Text=Bolin says : " Looks like there 's no where to go . "
#Text=Lin Beifong says : " Secure the president and call for backup immediately ! "
#Text=Ginger / Actress Ginger says : " Bolin , look out !
#Text=Bolin is bending two full stacks of earth disks at once , which would normally be illegal , but then again , he 's fighting three waterbenders , so all rules are out the window !
